GeneDef.label: Cognitive Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically prevents conscisness from passing 90%, and makes it exceedingly difficult to drop it. This makes these pawns highly resistant to brain trauma!

GeneDef.label: Movement Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizes movment, keeping it at a maximum of 30%, allowing even the almost-legless some mobility.

GeneDef.label: Manipulation Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies manipulation, preventing it from passing 30%, but makeing it so even major injurys (such as loosing 1 arm, and almost all of the other) doesn't completly stop their manipulation capabilities!

GeneDef.label: Communication Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies talking, by keeping it at 90%. Not that hard to get over, communication wise. And, it is almost impossible to get it down!

GeneDef.label: Eating Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies eating, which makes it slightly harder to eat in general, but almost impossible to be unable to eat!

GeneDef.label: Visual Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies sight, allowing them to see no matter the injury, at the cost of minorly impaired sight

GeneDef.label: Auditory Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies hearing, allowing them to maintain hearing even with extreme injury, at the cost of slightly imaired hearing.

GeneDef.label: Respiratory Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically breathing, making it very hard to drop bellow 90%. While that isn't as good as 100%, it's bareley noticible. Not to mention, highly injury resistant!

GeneDef.label: Blood Filtration Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically blood filtration. While being limited to 90% does make you a bit more sensitive to diseases, the fact that severe injury won't have an effect on the filtration will assist if you have to, say, remove a kidney!

GeneDef.label: Cardiac Stability: 60%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizies the heart, meaning that, so long as just a fragment of the heart remains, it works! if they loose it completley though...

GeneDef.label: Digestive Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one specifically stabalizes digestion, making it harder to digest food, but where almost no injury will impeede it!

GeneDef.label: Complete Stability: 90%
GeneDef.description:
The Bio-Stabalizer Genes are designed to heigten specific stats, at the cost of longer rests and minor pain.
This one stabalizes everything, utilizing archites. As you can imagine, such pawns are a tad weaker than other pawns, but can take an absurd about of injurys before any noticible effect!
